name: Motorcycle Rider (itch)
description:
Take your motorcycle to the next level in this dynamic motorbike racer game. you are behind the wheels of a motorbike in a much more detailed gaming experience. Take boosters on your way to boost your bombastic ride. Enjoy your motor craft racer in beautiful themes in a fun packed fast bikes race. You can use coins to upgrade your motorcycles to enhance speed, control system, braking system, nitrogen acceleration and more.

Ride your motorbike on endless busy roads and highways and watch out for oncoming vehicles to survive for the longest time. Control your motorcycle with incredible fast speed during traffic rush time! Have fun dodging cars and trucks while you speed up to the limit. Dodge traffic, increase your speed and score in this fast motorcycle racing challenge.
